Reviews.Title: Best Service I have ever received
Reviews.Author: David M
Reviews.Content: The Zmodo is a very good Mid-Level CCTV System.  However what makes a good product Great, is the service you receive from the people who market and sell the product.  This is one of the few times there isn't a high enough rating for their service and communications.  And yes I have already purchased additional equipment from them and I will be getting more stuff from them this week as well.I don't feel there isn't a better Mid-level CCTV System out there for the money you spend, you really can't go wrong.  I just want to say Thank You for your support and looking forward to my future dealings with you as well. Again, Thanks.

ProductInfo.Features:
Network Access and Live View via Smart Phone & 3G Mobile
